## SequelizeCrudRepository.getSequelizeModelAttributes() method

Get Sequelize Model Attributes

**Signature:**

```typescript

        [name: string]: PropertyDefinition;
    }): ModelAttributes<SequelizeModel, Attributes<SequelizeModel>>;
```
